mapper.insert: insert into comment(c_contents, c_playtime, c_upload_time, u_id, ve_id) values (#{c_contents}, #{c_playtime}, #{c_upload_time}, #{u_id}, #{ve_id});
mapper.select: select c_id, c_contents, c_playtime, c_upload_time, u_id, u_nickname, comment_good_count from ((select c_id, c_contents, c_playtime, c_upload_time; from comment_info where ve_id = #{ve_id}) A left outer join member B on A.u_id = B.u_id) C left outer join (select c_id, count(*) as comment_good_count from comment_good group by c_id) D on C.c_id = D.c_id;
